original_title: ソウル・オブ・ロック
overview: The Bamiyans is an unpopular three-member rock band. The band members have totally different personalities, but share the same passion for rock. These three get together and talk at the izakaya, the Japanese-style pub, have a quarrel at the studio and compete with another band to find their love for rock and dreams for the future.
title: Soul of Rock
